attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2025-0570

Date: 2025-07-03

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable Sean Fraser, P.C., be appointed one of His Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law and that a Commission be issued to him.


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Sean Fraser, C.P., soit nommé conseiller juridique de Sa Majesté et qu’une commission lui soit délivrée à cet effet.
